findings.rationale: The confidentiality obligations last only two years after discussions, which may expose sensitive information post-termination.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.rationale: The definition of confidential information is broad, potentially leading to disputes over what constitutes confidential data.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other, including technical data, business strategies, customer information, and financial information.

findings.rationale: The agreement lacks clarity on permissible disclosures, which could lead to unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party agrees to: (b) Not use the information for any purpose other than evaluating business opportunities.
